duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce models applicable to pricing and targeting using machine learning and statistical learning techniques.
Apply mathematical optimization techniques to solve network problems.
Experiment and build models that improve the capabilities of the marketing platform.
Collaborate with Engineering and Business teams to implement scalable, reliable, and useful solutions.
Run numerous experiments in a fast-paced, analytical culture to quickly learn and adapt work.
Help connect millions of visitors to affiliates and internal properties to the products and services they are searching for.

education_certification.credential: MS in Computer Science or related area, or relevant work experience
